title: Indecision
description: Dwight is only twenty-eight, but he's having a midlife crisis. Of course, living a dissolute, dorm like existence in a tiny apartment and working in tech support at Pfizer - are not especially conducive to wisdom. His biggest a chronic inability to make up his mind. Encouraged by one of his roommates, he swallows the first fateful pill.
author: Benjamin Kunkel
